message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of tracking objects in far-field scenes using PTZ cameras, which is a common problem in computer vision and robotics. The paper proposes a solution that involves continuous on-line calibration of the camera, which is a key aspect of computer vision. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also deals with the problem of tracking objects, which is a common problem in robotics, and involves motion compensation, which is a common problem in robotics and control theory. Therefore, the paper could also belong to cs.RO (Robotics and Control), cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
